hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Friday Blue - Blue Sky and Water
hiveArticle.body:
This image is taken in Dubai where I went last year. I wouldn't say Image is great but the scene is real beauty as you can see both sky and water of the same color.

![IMG-20160213-WA0063.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSavSqc9F3cvaz592rUKDdgt5gg6dLbNPQ2yKUrpMxbFj/IMG-20160213-WA0063.jpg)
